CustomField.formula: "Please click " + "'" + "In Progress" + "'" + " button before clicking " + "'" + "Submit for Approval" + "'" + "." + BR() + "If no approver is added below, then action plan owner will be prompted to add an approver after clicking " + "\"" + "Submit for Approval" + "\"" + " button."
CustomField.label: Approval Process Help
